import {Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; import {ISummary} from "../interfaces/cv-interfaces"; @Component({ selector: 'app-summary-view', templateUrl: './summary-view.component.html', styleUrls: ['./summary-view.component.css'] }) export class SummaryViewComponent { @Input() public summaryData: ISummary // // public showDetails: boolean = true; // // public toggleDetails(): void { // this.showDetails = !this.showDetails // } }
